T02TD3007E:63a-0: @63a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3007E:63a-1: bsgrub bya klu rnams kyi byang du gzhug bar 'dod pa'i sgrub ba po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02TD3007E:63a-2: klu gdug pa dang ldan ba'i sa gang na gnas pa'i sa nas /
T02TD3007E:63a-3: sa dang rdo dang shing dang chu la sogs pa blangs la stegs bu khru gang ba cig byas la /
T02TD3007E:63a-4: de la snga ma bzhin du klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD3007E:63a-5: mtha' ma klu shing sna tshogs bas bskor la gzhag go //
T02TD3007E:63a-6: de'i byang du dur khrod kyi sa las gru gsum nag po byas te /
T02TD3007E:63a-7: de'i steng du mdze thod kyi nang du bsgrub bya'i gos dum bu'am dri chan dri chu rjes sa la sogs pa gang rnyed dang /
T02TD3007E:63a-8: bag zan bsres la de'i khong du ra'i khrag gis bsgrub bya'i ming dang rus ngang yul dang sa khyim dang /
T02TD3007E:63b-0: pha tshan dang dur ming bris la dur khrod kyi ras ma la sna tshogs rdo rje dug khrag gis bris pas dril la yugs sa @63b mo'i skra skud phyin ka log gis rgya gram bsgril la gzhag go //
T02TD3007E:63b-1: de'i nang du spre'u'i khrag dang mdze khrag dang ra rog po'i khrag gtig go //
T02TD3007E:63b-2: lcags phye dang dur khrod kyi rdo phye dang /
T02TD3007E:63b-5: dug sna tshogs la klu brgyad kyi snying po 'bum phrag bdun bzlas shing brub /
T02TD3007E:63b-6: skabs su klu rnams la bstod cing gtor ma sbyin /
T02TD3007E:63b-7: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD3007E:63b-8: klu'i snying po'i gzhug la aa mu kam m'a ra ya phat ces gdags so //
T02TD3007E:63b-9: de nas rgyud rdzogs pa brgya bklags la /
T02TD3007E:63b-10: mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la klu'i pho brang du mnan ba byas na bsgrub bya de zla ba lnga nas gdon mi za bar brlag par nges so //
T02TD3007E:63b-11: de yang rgyal rigs la gtad na mdze thod kyis bya /
T02TD3007E:63b-12: rje'u rigs la glang dmar po'i rva g-yas pa /
T02TD3007E:63b-13: bram ze la rabs chad kyi thod pa /
T02TD3007E:63b-14: dmangs rigs la sbal pa'i lus por bya /
T02TD3007E:63b-15: gdol pa la phag nag po'i thod par bya /
T02TD3007E:63b-16: glud dang chu gtor ci mang du gtong ngo //
T02TD3007E:63b-17: bsgrub bya klu rnams kyi byad du gzhug pa'i cho ga srog gcod kyi spu gri zhes bya ba /
T02TD3007E:63b-18: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
